verbs.description: pierce brosnan reunites with ‘ mrs doubtfire’ [V: kids] 25 years later photo hello twenty - five years since the release of the family favorite comedy mrs doubtfire pierce brosnan has reunited with the child stars from the film man they grow up so fast lisa jakub shared this photo on twitter of brosnan herself mara wilson and matthew lawrence getting together to meet up with their honorary stepdad read the full article on the wrap lisa jakub mara wilson 25 years pierce brosnan matthew lawrence
